languages.text: "Присвоение чужого — суть преступление против воли Его, разделившего всех людей на достойных обладать и недостойных".
"To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."
languages.original_text: "Присвоение чужого — суть преступление против воли Его, разделившего всех людей на достойных обладать и недостойных".

traits.locale_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all men into those who are worthy of having said possessions and those who are not."
"To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all men into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."
"To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all men into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."
"To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."
"To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

languages.text: "Die Aneignung fremden Besitzes verstößt gegen Seinen Willen, denn Er hat die Menschen in jene unterteilt, die würdig sind, über besagten Besitz zu verfügen, und jene, die es nicht sind ..."
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aneignung fremden Besitzes verstößt gegen Seinen Willen, denn Er hat die Menschen in jene unterteilt, die würdig sind, über besagten Besitz zu verfügen, und jene, die es nicht sind ..."

languages.text: « Quiconque s'approprie les possessions d'autrui bafoue la volonté de l'Empereur, car Il a divisé toute l'humanité entre ceux qui sont dignes de détenir lesdites possessions et ceux qui ne le sont pas. »
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: « Quiconque s'approprie les possessions d'autrui bafoue la volonté de l'Empereur, car Il a divisé toute l'humanité entre ceux qui sont dignes de détenir lesdites possessions et ceux qui ne le sont pas. »

languages.text: “挪用他人财产等同于违背神皇的意志，因为神皇早已将所有人类分成了两类——有权拥有上述财产的人，以及不配拥有上述财产的人。”
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: “挪用他人财产等同于违背神皇的意志，因为神皇早已将所有人类分成了两类——有权拥有上述财产的人，以及不配拥有上述财产的人。”

languages.text: «Apropiarse de bienes ajenos es una transgresión contra Su voluntad, pues fue Él quien dividió a la Humanidad entre los que merecen tener esas posesiones y quienes no merecen tenerlas».
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: «Apropiarse de bienes ajenos es una transgresión contra Su voluntad, pues fue Él quien dividió a la Humanidad entre los que merecen tener esas posesiones y quienes no merecen tenerlas».

languages.text: 「他人の財産を横領することは、皇帝の意志に背く行為である。皇帝はすべての人類を、その財産を所有するに値する者と、そうでない者とに厳然と区分されたのだから」
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: 「他人の財産を横領することは、皇帝の意志に背く行為である。皇帝はすべての人類を、その財産を所有するに値する者と、そうでない者とに厳然と区分されたのだから」

languages.text: "Başkasının malını zimmetine geçirmek, O'nun iradesine aykırı bir cürümdür. Zira O, tüm İnsanlıkğı bu mallara layık olanlar ve olmayanlar şeklinde ayırmıştır."
languages.original_text: "To appropriate another's possessions is a transgression against His will, for He has divided all of Humanity into those who are worthy of having said possessions, and those who are not."

traits.locale_text: "Başkasının malını zimmetine geçirmek O'nun iradesine aykırı bir cürümdür zira O, tüm İnsanlık'ı bu mallara layık olanlar ve olmayanlar diye ayırmıştır."
